etomica.nbr

Class CriterionTypePair

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.nbr.CriterionAdapter
      • etomica.nbr.CriterionTypePair
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NeighborCriterion, java.io.Serializable

    public class CriterionTypePair
extends CriterionAdapter
    Filters atoms pairs to match a given pair of AtomTypes.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(IAtomList pair)
      Returns true if the AtomTypes for the pair of atoms match the AtomTypes given at construction (without regard to the order of the pair), and if the wrapped criterion also accepts the pair.
      IAtomType[] getTypes()
      Returns the AtomTypes accepted by this NeighborCriterion
